scripts.prerelease: cd packages/eslint-plugin-svelte && pnpm clean && pnpm run build && cd ../..
scripts.version: env-cmd -e version cd packages/eslint-plugin-svelte && pnpm run update && cd ../..
scripts.version:ci: env-cmd -e version-ci cd packages/eslint-plugin-svelte && pnpm run update && cd ../.. && changeset version
